live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
46889.summary: Some customers in the Panorama Hills area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
46889.title: Feb 16 – Calgary (Panorama Hills)| All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
